data.actual_result: The notification badges gets an additional count based on how many you had before you got logged out from disabling 2FA.
data.expected_result: Notification Badges go away when logged out, and the number shown reflects the actual amount of notifs you're supposed to have.
data.short_description: Notification Badges stay after being forcibly logged out of your account from disabling 2FA.
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable 2FA - Get Notification Badges - On PC, remove 2FA - Login again in iOS - Get more Notification Badges
